summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3800 for the improvement of 2nd Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 72nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46815, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
